name: Yanfei
storytext: One who fails to revise the classics is liable to fall foul of the law.
source: Reward for inviting Yanfei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Signed Edict
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113081]</color> to this character.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> and attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scarlet Seal</color> to this character.
skills.description: Deals 3 Pyro DMG and attaches Scarlet Seal to this character.

skills.name: Done Deal
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113081]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113082]</color> to this character.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scarlet Seal</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Brilliance</color> to this character.
skills.description: Deals 3 Pyro DMG, attaches Scarlet Seal and Brilliance to this character.
